Are there any &quot;out of time&quot; playbooks or compendium classes like a cowboy or something like that. Thinking of running an entire campaign on this theme.

<div id='comment z13ustcrhriat5yhe04cjvjhdrrktdtznjo'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/117175341165637840811_photo.jpg'> James Etheridge</h4>
      <p><cite>2017-12-12 23:46:35 (edited: 2017-12-13 00:20:28)</cite></p>
        <p>Not a cowboy, but the Star Mage is an alien from another world (that&#39;s one of the possible backgrounds anyway, they&#39;re all pretty weird).<br /><br />Any of the playbooks from Adventures on Dungeon Planet would work, too.<br /><br />You could use heritage rules or just alternate race moves and play Atlanteans or dinosaurs or whatever.<br /><br />The Maid could be a character from modern times.<br /><br />Many of these are not particularly well balanced, but for a gonzo sort of game maybe that&#39;s not a big deal.</p>
</div>
